titleNullable: social media by students between age 17-22
descriptionNullable:
🟨Positive effects of social media
1️⃣. being in touch
Media or social networks are a wonderful tool to communicate with others. Using social networks, you can contact your family and friends, you can also share photos, messages, videos, etc. with them and communicate with them. If your relatives or friends are abroad and you cannot contact them, you can use social media. In fact, the Internet is an easy and convenient way to communicate with friends and acquaintances in different countries.

2️⃣. A source of learning and teaching
The impact of social media for students and teachers is very high. You can go online and increase your knowledge or change your knowledge and update it. There are also various resources and topics that you can upload.
3️⃣ Save time and money
Obviously, you can stay at home and do some work over the internet. You can find some useful information on social media without going to the library or university. Older people can earn additional certifications through online courses, and teenagers or young adults can increase their knowledge at home. You can even make your purchase through online sites and stores.

4️⃣ Increase friends
This is the first and most important positive effect of social media and everyone can achieve it. Today, thanks to social media, you can easily make friends and communicate with others. In the past decades, it was very difficult for people to communicate with others because they had to go to each other and talk to each other in person, but today, with the changes in technology, people's communication has become much easier.

Each person may have thousands of friends or members on social networking sites such as Facebook or Twitter. Although he may not be very comfortable with them and cannot share his personal issues with them and spend part of his daily time with them, they are considered his friends. Social media can help you make friends with people from all over the world and expand your reach.

5️⃣. Sympathy
On social media, people tend to share all the ups and downs of their lives with people they think care about them. On social media, people listen to your messages, photos, and videos and help you solve problems.

The point is that since we all share all the good and bad happenings of life on social networks, then we have the ability to empathize with others. Sometimes, a friend who has had your problem and managed to solve it successfully can help you solve the problems.

🟥The negative impact of social networks
1️⃣ addiction
Yes, this is a fact; Social media can make you addicted to the internet. You can spend hours on the internet, read news, play games or work on it. Many people can't get away from the computer. Instead of learning something from social networks, some young people use it to do other things and spend all day on the Internet.

2️⃣. Increase in violence
It is an undeniable fact that the Internet gives us an opportunity to approach new technology and modern life. However, social media can increase the risk of sexual violence and abuse. Teenagers or young people watch inappropriate movies on this internet and associate bad news with negative action.

3️⃣. Increased threat
One of the negative effects of social media is threats. Along with some of its beneficial effects, social media increases negative consequences. This is because too many people consider social media as a place to share their personal information. This is a good opportunity to increase the threat. As a result, you should be careful about what you upload or download.

4️⃣ Increased comparison
One of the negative effects of social networks is related to comparing young people with each other. The digital personalities of people who exist in social networks are significantly different from their real personalities and identities. You may think that they are much better than you, but it is better to always remember that they are human beings just like you and have certain strengths and weaknesses just like you.
